content.p: Careers Adviser (Science), Faculty of Registrars Role & How I Can Help: I hold 1-1 appointments on application and interviews and deliver employability workshops across the faculty, and on our central events programme. I also have a remit to support Science students looking for placements or internships as part of the Optional Placement Year. Background & Expertise: I've worked in Higher Education since 2013 at universities across the East Midlands. I have a particular interest in the university experience of students from non-traditional backgrounds and have worked with young people in schools and colleges to help them with their decision-making process as well as university students with career decision-making. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
